title: AI Research Pathway
description: Learn how to engage with AI research: reading papers, reproducing experiments, and exploring research communities with vibecoding tools.
overview: This pathway teaches how to engage with AI research: reading and understanding papers, reproducing experiments using AI coding tools, and exploring resources and communities. It finishes with a light introduction to contributing original ideas.
learningOutcomes: Read AI research papers critically and efficiently
Navigate academic resources like arXiv and Papers With Code
Reproduce research results using vibecoding tools
Explore AI research communities and datasets
tools: Claude Code / Gemini CLI / OpenAI CLI

modules.title: Reading AI Research Papers (Foundations)
modules.description: Learn how to parse academic AI papers efficiently.
topics: Anatomy of an AI research paper
Abstract vs introduction vs methods vs results
How to read papers efficiently (20-minute method)

resources.title: How to Read an AI Research Paper in 20 Minutes
Paper Structure Cheat Sheet (Abstract → Methods → Results → Discussion)
Skim Vision Transformer paper on arXiv, identify key sections
Quiz: Which section contains experiment setup details?
Summarize one paper (abstract + contributions) in 200 words max

modules.title: From Paper to Code (Builder)
modules.description: Reproduce research implementations using vibecoding tools.

resources.title: Reproducing Papers Without Writing All the Code
Guide to Papers With Code + Hugging Face model hub (PDF)
Use Claude/Gemini CLI to scaffold Colab notebook for simple model
Quiz: What is Papers With Code used for?
Reproduce experiment from simple NLP/CV paper using vibecoding

modules.hardwareNote: Colab Free tier sufficient for toy reproductions

modules.title: Research Resources & Communities (Innovator)
modules.description: Explore resources, datasets, and communities for staying current.
topics: Hugging Face papers and datasets hub

resources.title: Where AI Research Lives: arXiv, Hugging Face, Twitter/X, Discords
Resource List — arXiv sanity tools, HF papers/datasets hub (PDF)
Navigate HF model cards, find implementation for trending paper
Quiz: Which platform links papers to code implementations?
Curate resource sheet: 3 datasets + 3 models for one subfield (RL/CV/LLMs)

modules.title: From Reader to Contributor (Capstone)
modules.description: Learn basic steps to go from consuming research to producing ideas.

resources.title: How to Brainstorm Research Contributions Without Writing a Full Paper
Elements of an AI Paper — intro, contribution, experiments, discussion (PDF)
Use AI to draft mock research experiment plan
Quiz: Novel contribution vs reproduction paper differences
Capstone: Choose from mini-proposal, LaTeX abstract, or reproducibility report
